channel.title: [HELP] No Compiling Errors But When i Run The Server? [Rep++]
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.langNumberFormatException. For input string: "1 264 2863 3736 0 2866 9953 2862 9949 1" at java.langNumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1995) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:554) at server.main(server.java:115)[/code]
^shows up when i'm running my server ...

item.title: [HELP] No Compiling Errors But When i Run The Server? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:3, topic:273592”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=361526.msg2749176#msg2749176 date=1239814375]
you have used to many spaces or not enough in autospawn.cfg. always use tabs in config files.
[/quote]

Yup, Java is not a friend of spaces.[/quote]Umm, it’s not Java. It’s the methods that load the info from the CFGs…

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] No Compiling Errors But When i Run The Server? [Rep++]

@Fallen127 wrote:

yeah, no kidding… I i was stuck for 5 hours and i agree tabs are the best.
